The class ExchangeStudentMessage represent the action that exchange students in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game

execute(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
The method execute take the message arrived from the users, check if the sender of the action is the current player, check if the action is legit in that phase of the turn and then call the method execute of message, every message has an override of the method execute of the super class Message, in every message the execute method modify tha game in a different way and return an update object, the update object id analyzed by the execute method of gamehandler to refresh the state of the turn and phase
execute(Game) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.AddMeMessage
The method execute is an override of the class Message, apply all the changes needed to the model through the game to add a new player
execute(Game) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.BlockColorMessage
